name: A Bag of Beans
description: Plant one to find out if you're getting a fruit tree or a pyramid full of mummies.

name: The Deck of Many Things
description: A deck of cards designed to end a campaign in exactly 30 seconds.

name: The Flagon of Sobriety
description: An item that turns the best ale into room-temperature water. Truly evil.

name: An Immovable Rod
description: A button-activated rod that defies gravity and physics, usually placed in inconvenient places.

name: Cursed Sending Stones
description: They only receive telepathic spam about your carriage's extended warranty.

name: A Portable Hole
description: A circle of cloth that creates a hole. Do not put it inside a Bag of Holding.

name: A Sentient Sword that won't stop screaming
description: It has +3 to attack but -10 to your patience.

name: A Cloak of Billowing
description: Does absolutely nothing except look cool in a light breeze.
